```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

### Assign bfi data as a new object data 

```{r}
data <- psych::bfi
```

### The first part of data

```{r}
head(data)
```

### Column names of data

```{r}
colnames(data)
```

### Mean of the first column excluding the missing values

```{r}
mean(data[,1], na.rm = T)
```

### Number of rows

```{r}
nrow(data)
```
